title: California State University, Monterey Bay
headline: Bachelors in Science, Computer Sicence
searchDescription: Coursework: Computer Architecture, Algorithms & Data Structures, Computational Theory
longDescription: My academic journey at CSUMB equipped me with a deep understanding of core computer science principles, including software engineering, data science, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity. Through a rigorous curriculum and project-based learning, I developed strong programming skills in Java, Python, and C++, along with expertise in cloud computing, machine learning, and database management.

title: Harrisburg University of Science & Technology
headline: Masters in Science, Computer Science
searchDescription: Coursework: Machine Learning, Open AI, Big Data
longDescription: My pursuit of a Master’s degree in Computer Science at Harrisburg University has provided me with advanced knowledge in software engineering, artificial intelligence, big data analytics, and cybersecurity. The program’s research-oriented curriculum, coupled with industry-driven projects, has allowed me to explore complex problem-solving methodologies and develop innovative technical solutions.
